verses.verse: To the chief Musician <S%H5329><s%> upon Neginah <S%H5058><s%>, A Psalm of David <S%H1732><s%>. Hear <S%H8085><s%> my cry <S%H7440><s%>, O God <S%H430><s%>; attend <S%H7181><s%> unto my prayer <S%H8605><s%>.

From the end <S%H7097><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%> will I cry <S%H7121><s%> unto thee, when my heart <S%H3820><s%> is overwhelmed <S%H5848><s%>: lead <S%H5148><s%> me to the rock <S%H6697><s%> that is higher <S%H7311><s%> than I.
For thou hast been a shelter <S%H4268><s%> for me, and a strong <S%H5797><s%> tower <S%H4026><s%> from <S%H6440><s%> the enemy <S%H341><s%>.

I will abide <S%H1481><s%> in thy tabernacle <S%H168><s%> for ever <S%H5769><s%>: I will trust <S%H2620><s%> in the covert <S%H5643><s%> of thy wings <S%H3671><s%>. Selah <S%H5542><s%>. trust: or, make my refuge
For thou, O God <S%H430><s%>, hast heard <S%H8085><s%> my vows <S%H5088><s%>: thou hast given <S%H5414><s%> me the heritage <S%H3425><s%> of those that fear <S%H3373><s%> thy name <S%H8034><s%>.

Thou wilt prolong <S%H3254><s%> the king's <S%H4428><s%> life <S%H3117><s%> <S%H3117><s%>: and his years <S%H8141><s%> as many <S%H1755><s%> generations <S%H1755><s%>. Thou: Heb. Thou shalt add days to the days of the king as: Heb. as generation and generation
He shall abide <S%H3427><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> God <S%H430><s%> for ever <S%H5769><s%>: O prepare <S%H4487><s%> mercy <S%H2617><s%> and truth <S%H571><s%>, which may preserve <S%H5341><s%> him.
So will I sing <S%H2167><s%> praise unto thy name <S%H8034><s%> for ever <S%H5703><s%>, that I may daily <S%H3117><s%> <S%H3117><s%> perform <S%H7999><s%> my vows <S%H5088><s%>.
